name: 2d_SpaceShooter
description:
This is my simple game it's a 2d shooter I coded the game by myself from scratch but I used the Coursera course as a reference of info. 

I added a health bar for each enemy and the player I also add a double gun when the player kills a number of enemies and a speed boost when the player holds the space button, there is also an ult when the player press the f key but only work after killing a number of enemies, there is 3 difficulty in the game each one has its own scene. 

the player wins when he kills the final boss
